message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this valuable product. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value, however, my original offer reflects the true worth and potential of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $850,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to go up to $800,000, but no more. Can you consider that?
